name: Super Donkey Kong
description:
Jumpman is making his way to take Pauline from Donkey Kong! Donkey Kong must stop this foe by hurling large amounts of wooden projectiles until he stops.

Features:

- Tough but fair gameplay!

- Barrel throwing technology!

- Two gameplay modes!

- Unlockable costumes!

- Less bananas than ideal!

- Unreal graphics!
